name: Salvatore CHIMENTI, Susan Borish and Hans Vorhauer, Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Chimenti v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Salvatore CHIMENTI, Susan Borish and Hans Vorhauer, Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 17th day of November, 1999, the order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
740 A.2d 1139
Salvatore CHIMENTI, Susan Borish and Hans Vorhauer, Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 17, 1999.
